title: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing the 'finish' button, the JAR packager throws an error message: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'
OB: When trying to create a JAR file, I encountered an issue where the JAR packager reports open files very late
EB: The JAR packager should not report open files late and should create the JAR file successfully
SR:
1. Open the JAR packager
2. Add some files to the JAR
3. Press the 'finish' button
